name: PFC Technologies Inc.
description: Developer of a lending platform designed to process all loans through a bank-integrated system. The company's platform operates with banks and other financial institutions to ease the lending process and the loan is made available via various third-party applications as well, enabling customers to get a personal loan at a low-interest rate.
one_liner: Developer of a lending platform designed to process all loans through a bank-integrated system. The company's platform operates with banks and other financial institutions to ease the lending process and the loan is made available via various third-party applications as well, enabling customers to get a personal loan at a low-interest rate.
